title: 128. Validating Narcissistic Abuse
itunes:title: Validating Narcissistic Abuse
description:
On this episode of the Self Love Fix podcast, I’m discussing validating narcissistic abuse. This is a very unique and troubling form of emotional abuse, and for that reason, it can be tough to validate your feelings surrounding it. But it’s very important to do so in order to begin your healing process.

I’m here to help you figure out how to validate these feelings and move forward, feeling lighter and more complete after what you’ve endured.

In this episode, I cover:

  • A Misunderstood Trauma
  • Developing a Support System
  • Reshuffling the Deck You Were Dealt

I hope that this episode helps you to connect with why it’s so important to go through the process of validating your feelings surrounding narcissistic abuse. To hear all the ways to work through this, listen to the entire episode on your favorite streaming platform.

If you liked this episode of the podcast, take a screenshot, head on over to my Instagram and share it on your IG stories and tag me, @theselflovefix

If you love what you learned, be sure to hit that follow button so you never miss a future episode, and make sure to leave a review to help me reach more listeners just like you looking to follow their inner truth and live a life of abundance & authentic self-love.
